titleStmt.title: A Catechisme for communicants. Set forth for the benefit of the willing to be well prepared for the receiving of that great mystery of the Lords Supper. / By A wel-willer [sic] unto all the children and servants in this great citie, and the suburbs, but most especially those of the parish of Dunstans East, London.
titleStmt.author: Bridges, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.C. for Andrew Crook, at the Green Dragon in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon in Pauls Churchyard
